attributes.action: allow Bill Bailey represent Great Britain at The Eurovision song contest in 2010.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Myself and many others are joint in the belief that Bill Bailey would be a perfect ambassador for the country at the Eurovision song contest. He is a gifted and talented musician and songwriter. He would also bring to the contest all that Britain has and can offer which former contestants have failed to do so.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
